Method Detail

bookmark

public void bookmark(CommentModel comment)
Used to add OR remove a comment ID from the bookmark's list. If the ID exists its removed, else its added.

Parameters:
ID - The comment ID

readingComment

public void readingComment(CommentModel comment)
This method is used to tell the user model that we are viewing a specific comment. This allows us to remove it from the want to read bookmarks list upon reading.

Parameters:
comment - The comment we are reading

favourite

public void favourite(CommentModel comment)
Used to add OR remove a comment ID from the favourites's list. If the ID exists its removed, else its added.

Parameters:
ID - The comment ID

                          Bitmap profile)
